Body.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 3), plastic back, aluminum frame
Body.SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

Platform.OS: Android 10, upgradable to Android 11, One UI 3.0
Platform.CPU: Octa-core (2x2.2 GHz Cortex-A77 & 6x1.8 GHz Cortex A55)

Main Camera.Quad:
64 MP, f/1.8, 26mm (wide), 1/1.72", 0.8µm, PDAF
12 MP, f/2.2, 123˚ (ultrawide)
5 MP, f/2.4, (macro)
5 MP, f/2.2, (depth)

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot
Comms.GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

Misc.Colors: Prism Cube Black, Prism Cube Sliver, Prism Cube Blue
Misc.Models: SM-A716F, SM-A716F/DS, SM-A716F/DSN, SM-A7160, SM-A716B/DS, SM-A716U, SM-A716B, SM-A716U1
